FireArrow.Name: FireArrow
FireArrow.Narrative: shoots a fiery arrow, igniting the target

IceSpike.Name: IceSpike
IceSpike.Narrative: launches a spike of ice, freezing the target briefly

ShadowStrike.Name: ShadowStrike
ShadowStrike.Narrative: utilizes the shadows to strike unseen, poisoning and blinding the target

ThunderClap.Name: ThunderClap
ThunderClap.Narrative: claps with the force of thunder, stunning the target

HealingWave.Name: HealingWave
HealingWave.Narrative: casts a soothing wave, healing wounds

VengefulSpear.Name: VengefulSpear
VengefulSpear.Narrative: thrusts a spear with vengeful might, causing deep wounds

DarkWhisper.Name: DarkWhisper
DarkWhisper.Narrative: whispers dark secrets, instilling fear and silence

MysticBarrier.Name: MysticBarrier
MysticBarrier.Narrative: conjures a barrier of mystic energy, protecting from harm

EarthenGrasp.Name: EarthenGrasp
EarthenGrasp.Narrative: causes the earth to rise and grasp, immobilizing the target
